title: [Large-Scale] Clinical Learning Environment Evaluation and Clinical Supervision Strategy Development for Nursing

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental nursing theories and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Focuses on enabling preservice nursing instructors to evaluate clinical learning environments and design effective supervision methods, incorporating offline activities and small-group tasks using smartphones

learning_goals: The Clinical Learning Environment Scale (CLES+T) can be utilized to analyze five subdomains of clinical learning environments.
A project report comparing the impact of clinical supervision methods on learner engagement can be prepared.
Data collection and sharing procedures for evaluating learning environments via smartphones in resource-constrained settings can be designed.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
